message: So Tom tweeted that the All About Android show is launching tomorrow.  The Social Hour with Amber and Sarah is also a Monday show, replacing net@night.  I assume that Leo will not be hosting All About Android since Monday is the only day he takes off.  Does anyone know who's hosting?
Also, I hope this doesn't cause too much duplication between things covered on TWiG and AAA.
Well... a little digging and I found the answer.  Its going to be hosted by Jason Howell, Ron Richards and Eileen.

@Ledlow With Gina going all Apple fangirl and Leo giving his Android phones to his clumsy employees at an alarming rate, I feel the Android content of TWiG is more likely to shrink in the near term, anyways. ;-)
I wonder, is there a way to add the twit schedules to something like a Google calendar?
The TWiT schedule is on Google calendar.  That's what you are looking at on the twit live page.

Admitting Apple is better experience than Android is not going all Fan Girl. Android is on it's way and, in my opinion, will surpass IOS in a few years but it's a mess right now. IOS is a well oiled machine. Everyone, especially the Apple haters, know this.
btw Leo said yesterday that he needs a new Android phone (e.g. the Bionic)
Starting to get the upgrade itch :)
I've got the Incredible and I'm kind of wondering when my next upgrade should be
Check out the Thunderbolt. Heard some great things about it.
Basically what I've learned is that a phone can be as great as it wants to be, but if the battery is dead, it's useless, haha
After this Incredible, my #1 biggest concern is battery life, and it looks like Thunderbolt isn't so great on that front, according to some reviews I've read.
Good point! LoL!
I have an incredible that is rooted running MIUI rom with a custom kernel. Awesome battery life here and I tal
My sister has a Android and she having to charge the phone all the time. Battery life just like the iPhone really crumby
k on the phone all the time.

@Ellerbestyle wow, you comment reminds me so much about the not-so-good old Windows Mobile days. I need to find custom ROM on xda-dev which basically has better memory management to reserve more juice and snappier UI...

I have been using a Nexus One (AT&T version) for about 8-9 months now and love it.  No desire to upgrade because the build quality of the Nexus S feels plastic and cheap compared to the N1.  Also, the things that it has over the N1 aren't features I deem important for my usage pattern (i.e. front facing camera).

I consider myself an equal opportunity fanboy and use what I feel is best for the task at hand.  Bought wifey an iPad that I use from time to time, she uses an iPhone 4 because it fits her needs well, I rock the Nexus One.  I have an iMac and a Dell E6410 running WIN7.  I use it all, and that way when I do have feedback, either positive or negative its founded on real usage and not just 'brand' love

@Trautvetter  Hey there, I was one of those clumsy employees. Crap happens and no one felt worse than I did. All About Android (AAA) posts tomorrow. Also I manage the stories on TWIG and host AAA. If you hate AAA, you'll always have Android content on TWiG.
Hey all - If you caught All About Android, let me know what you thought. Feed goes up sometime tomorrow. Thx! -Eileen
@jonathande4 I've created this link a while back for the TWIT calendar http://bit.ly/twit_schedule
@spaceguy1 Thank you very much for the link!

@eileentv If it wasn't clear from the smiley, I was joking in my post above. And yeah, I know only to well that losing stuff is only fun if you're not the one having done it. Well done on giving Leo a reason to move to his next phone, though! ;-) As for AAA, I really enjoyed watching you guys workshopping it, but the move to 2 am local has ruled me out as a live viewer. I'll try if it works for me as an audio podcast, but being a rather visual show with all the demos, that might not turn out so well. Anyways, best of luck with AAA!
Honestly there can never be too much TWiT talk about Android
eileen i'm stoked for the AAA show
@richardya Rubbish.

Eileen, Tell Jason he needs a camera angle for his close up shot.It will make a big difference. The show is going between a shot of you, the guy on the monitor and wide shot. He needs to add one for himself when he is talking. 

I bought an android device but took out the battery, motherboard antenna etc and put it in an iPhone casing, then I rooted it and I am now running IOS on it.
There can never be enough TwiT shows . If U ask Me
@eileentv Looking forward to the feed to check out your new show!
When is The Social Hour becoming a podcast for iTunes
@kyserboy today!
@richardya the problem is that we don't have enough cameras in the studio cottage. He is sacrificing himself for our devices. In the new studio we'll have all the cameras we need.
@kyserboy if you already subscribe to Net@Night you will automatically get the new show!
Listening to it now!
How do you Subscibe I click on the Subscribe and it carryes me too iToons with a list of those shows any ideas
We haven't posted it yet. Coming very soon. in a few hours :)
Is it on yet. I can't find the AAA on the Website to get the RSS feed. I don't use iTunes.
@spaceguy1 Thanks! Just what I needed.

@spaceguy1 Can the TWiT Calendar you linked to be made available to be added to a personal calendar in Google? Or is it possible I am not trying correctly. I used the link that however it will not allow me to add it.
The page doesn't allow us to get to the rss feeds
Is there a video RSS feed for AAA? Because I want to subscribe via gPodder.
@wally2you I used it as a css file then uploaded it to my Windows live callendar. I
@wally2you I'm assuming you can do something similiar.
The site has been updated but no feed yet... http://twit.tv/aaa
@johathande4 I will give Windows Live Calendar a try. Thanks
I listened to the audio podcast this morning (I live in Western Europe timezone) and enjoyed it very much
Just saw AAA episode one. A little ruff around the edges but all TWiT shows start out that way.
overall, i like it. but it needs to be more balanced,.. need more counter arguments
Needs more ego :)
@Arnold we're finding there isn't enough cameras to get all of the shots for our handhelds and get that single of Jason. But Jason also doesn't want a single. He's shy. We'll work on it!
